Name: Rapid Spin
Effect: Single Target. Increase the User's Dexterity by 1. Remove Entry Hazards, Terrains (ie Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain), Ongoing Damage and Leech seed from the User and/or their side of the field.
Description: The Pok√©mon makes a swift spin to strike at the foe and in the process everything laying close to the user is scattered out of the battlefield.
